Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 070125 ZSM, pursuant to Section 197-c and 201 of the Charter of the City of New York for the grant of a special permit pursuant to Section 74-711 of the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 4 to allow use group 6 commercial use below the fourth floor. This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to ยง197-d (b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to ยง197-d (b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
